mods.abstract: Results from a large scale quenched simulation of QCD at finite temperature are presented. We discuss the equation of state, the heavy quark potential and the spatial string tension at temperatures between 0.9 T-c and 5 T-c. The simulations were carried out on a massively parallel Quadrics computer.
